Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Release v0.4.0-alpha: API Integration for Carousel & News with Detail Page

Major release integrating live API for carousel and news content, plus new
news detail page with HTML rendering capabilities.

## Features Added

### API Integration
- Created SlideModel for carousel data structure
- Created ContentProvider with Dio HTTP client for API communication
- Integrated live carousel from API endpoint /site/12/slides
- Integrated live news from API endpoint /site/12/posts (limit 3)
- Added loading states with spinner indicators for all API calls
- Comprehensive error handling with user-friendly error messages
- Added dart:developer logging for API debugging

### News Detail Page
- New news_detail module (controller, view, binding)
- HTML content rendering using flutter_html package
- Full article display with hero image and metadata
- Fetches article by slug from API: /site/12/post/{slug}
- Error handling with retry functionality
- SEO-friendly slug-based routing
- Clean transparent AppBar design

### Data Models
- Updated NewsModel to match API response structure
  - New fields: idPost, url (slug), imageSmallUrl, imageMiddleUrl, tags
  - Legacy compatibility with backward-compatible getters (id, publishedDate)
  - HTML tag stripping helper for plain text descriptions
- Created SlideModel with fromJson/toJson methods

### UI/UX Improvements
- Simplified news card horizontal layout (removed category badge overlay)
- Added Material Design 3 headline text styles
- Loading indicators for carousel and news sections
- News cards now navigate to detail page on tap
- Transparent AppBar on news detail page for modern look

## Technical Changes
- Updated version: 0.3.1-alpha â†’ 0.4.0-alpha+20251008
- Added dependency: flutter_html ^3.0.0-beta.2
- Initialized ContentProvider in main.dart
- Updated HomeController to use API calls instead of dummy data
- Added Routes.NEWS_DETAIL route constant
- Fixed AppTextStyles to include headlineLarge, headlineMedium, headlineSmall
- Fixed NewsDummyData for compatibility with new NewsModel structure
- Updated CHANGELOG.md and CLAUDE.md with comprehensive documentation

## API Configuration
- Base URL: https://api.bandungkab.go.id/api
- Site ID: 12
- Timeout: 10 seconds (connect and receive)
- Endpoints:
  - GET /site/12/slides - Carousel/slides
  - GET /site/12/posts - News list
  - GET /site/12/post/{slug} - News detail

## Code Quality
- Fixed all critical analyzer errors (87 â†’ 28 info/warnings)
- No breaking changes - legacy compatibility maintained
- Proper error handling throughout
